Posts.Content: diagnosed with breast cancer. only small lump. had lumpectomy. when surgeon did ancillary node removal underarm found 27 0f 27 nodes where diseased. had to have ct scan because of this. awaiting results of scan. anyone else had simllar. very worried.
Posts.Title: bc with alot underarm lymph node involvement

Posts.Content: Hi Teggielass,  thanks for your reply. have been so worried and anxious. thought i might be dying. Had lumpectomy but surgeon couldnt get margin. so operated again so hopefully this time. when he told me about 27 of 27 lymph nodes infected i freaked out. had ct scan yesterday. seeing onc tomorrow. hoping he will have results of scan. you have reassured me so thanks. it is the waiting so hard. have requested to be your friend. bye for now
Posts.Title: bc with alot underarm lymph node involvement

Posts.Content: Hi Tessa,  good to hear from you. it has encouraged me.  will be glad when i get scan results as imagining the worst. good to hear how well you are doing. let you know my results soon.  Honey x
Posts.Title: bc with alot underarm lymph node involvement
